resources.string: Please note: We strongly recommend scheduling appointments for any showrooms you intend to visit outside of these officially published hours.

Instagram: @highpointmarket
 Facebook: @hpmkt
 Twitter: @hpmarketnews
 YouTube: High Point Market
Can I register when I get there?

High Point is located in the central part of the state of North Carolina. High Point is 70 miles north of Charlotte and 70 miles west of the Raleigh/Durham area. North Carolina is located on the east coast of the United States mid-way between Washington, DC and Atlanta, Georgia.
What address do I put into my GPS to find Market?

For parking purposes use the Park & Ride Lot North - Oak Hollow Mall - 921 Eastchester Drive, High Point, NC 27262 or Park & Ride Lot South - Market Center Drive Area- 490 West Market Center Drive, High Point, NC 27260. Shuttle services operate to and from both Park & Ride lots to the Transportation Terminal at 210 East Commerce Ave., High Point, NC 27260. No parking is provided at the Transportation Terminal. Parking is limited downtown and some streets are closed so make sure you use the FREE shuttle service and Park & Ride.
How much do Market passes cost?
There is an on-site registration fee of $30. Avoid paying this fee by registering before the pre- registration deadline.

Yes, on-site registration is available at the following locations: C&D Bldg , IHFC, Market Square, 220 Elm, Showplace, Suites at Market Square, Furniture Plaza, Plaza Suites, International Buyers Center. Press registration is only available at the Media Center located on the second floor of the High Point Theatre at the Transportation Terminal. THERE WILL BE A $30 NON-REFUNDABLE ONSITE PROCESSING FEE FOR EACH BUYER AND INDUSTRY PASS REQUESTED AFTER ONLINE REGISTRATION CLOSES.
When can the public shop the High Point Market?
The High Point Market is open to the trade only.
How much do shuttles from airports cost?

South Park & Ride Lot - 490 West Market Center Drive, High Point, NC 27260; North Park & Ride Lot Oak Hollow Mall, 921 Eastchester Drive, High Point, NC 27262. Free shuttles to downtown showroom district.
What Are High Point Market\'s Social Accounts?
Many showrooms do not allow photography. Please ask at each showroom before you take photographs.
Chat with Carolina on our website or text 1.855.723.2691. Carolina is available to assist 24/7, year-round.

A & B Home, Inc. is an international leader in the Home Décor, Accent Furniture, Garden and Seasonal Product businesses. With over 6000 current items, A & B Home is known for creating and distributing over 1500 new products every season, combining on-trend designs and high quality at price points that deliver excellent value to the customer.
A&B Home is proud to announce the move into a NEW 335,000 sq. ft. warehouse in northern CA! With new distribution and logistics in place, we cannot wait to see what this quarter has to offer!
A & B Home, Inc. is an international leader in the Home Décor, Accent Furniture, Garden and Seasonal Product businesses.

See where to go & never get lost
• Search for exhibitors you already know \n• Use filters to discover the products you\'re looking for
• ‘Love’ your favorite exhibitors \n• Take notes to save for later

• Save your favorite events & exhibitors in your MyMarket schedule to keep your visit organized \n• Create an account to sync your list across Apple and Android devices, as well as highpointmarket.org
• Send events and exhibitors to your friends right from the app \n• Links open on the web directly or directly in the app to quickly add to your MyMarket schedule
• Discover Market locations, exhibitors and filter by your MyMarket stops \n• Google Maps integration allows seamless navigation to your destinations
